page.title: 10RELIGION, CANON PYON AREA
page.content: At{Bush Bank}four parishes meet{_Canon {Pyon, Birley, Westhope & Kings Pyon. One vicar looks after them,{Ledgemoor too.The vicar lives in{Canon Pyon vicarage.He is the only vicar in Herefords. to farm his own{glebe land. The church at{Westhope}is made of corrugated iron, but has a pleasing atmosphere and attracts many people, from all the group of parishes,to its {Childrens Services}taken by a lay reader.When there is a fifth Sunday in the month a{Joint Service}is held at one of the Churches.These Sevices are always well attended, and people enjoy socialising afterwards over a cup of coffee.Apart from these occasions, Services are not well attended, especially in the winter, many of the loyal parishioners being elderly. All the Churches receive support from the other parishes when fund_raising.
